1517335328_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body: I use Cookie Autodelete which does exactly what it says. Lets you persist auth cookies and delete everything else. There's also an addon called Privacy Settings which provides a friendly interface to some about:config settings.

1518945446_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body: If I remember correctly, google streams VP9 on YouTube. Using it as a primary video format seems promising.
